title: Creates new crime of offering an unlawful gratuity to a juror, a class A misdemeanor, to prohibit a party from conferring or offering to confer payment on juror
summary: Makes it a class A misdemeanor for a party or representative of a party to an action or proceeding before a juror, and after discharge of such juror, to confer, or offer or agree to confer, any payment or benefit upon such juror or a third party, with intent to influence or reward such juror's conduct regarding that party in any court action or proceeding.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1012

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. LENTOL, WEINSTEIN -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of
         A. CAHILL, ENGLEBRIGHT, MAGNARELLI -- read once and  referred  to  the
         Committee on Codes

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  penal  law, in relation to offering an unlawful
         gratuity to a juror

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The penal law is amended by adding a new section 215.26 to
    2  read as follows:
    3  S 215.26 OFFERING AN UNLAWFUL GRATUITY TO A JUROR.
    4    A PERSON IS GUILTY OF OFFERING AN UNLAWFUL GRATUITY TO A  JUROR  WHEN,
    5  BEING  A  PARTY  OR REPRESENTATIVE OF A PARTY TO AN ACTION OR PROCEEDING
    6  BROUGHT BEFORE SUCH JUROR, AND AFTER DISCHARGE OF SUCH JUROR, HE OR  SHE
    7  CONFERS, OR OFFERS OR AGREES TO CONFER, ANY PAYMENT OR BENEFIT UPON SUCH
    8  JUROR OR A THIRD PERSON, WITH INTENT TO INFLUENCE OR REWARD SUCH JUROR'S
    9  CONDUCT REGARDING THAT PARTY IN ANY COURT ACTION OR PROCEEDING.
   10    OFFERING AN UNLAWFUL GRATUITY TO A JUROR IS A CLASS A MISDEMEANOR.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   12  ing the date upon which it shall have become a law.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03489-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to offering an unlawful gratuity to a juror
